ygData.subject: Re: Evil Smiths?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heyas, Ore on the continent of Faydwyer is found in the Windmills in Steamfont. Small molds are located in the small house outside of town with a telescope
ygData.messageBody:
Heyas,
Ore on the continent of Faydwyer is found in the Windmills in Steamfont.
Small molds are located in the small house outside of town with a telescope
sticking out of it.
Nagol

David wrote:

> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> Their are supplies in Neriak. Some molds are on a couple of ogres (the
> books mainly), and have been told about the guy upstairs in the mushroom inn
> sells some also (armor I think I was told) and the guy playing darts in the
> blind fish sells sharpening stones plus ore (this I know).
>
> Does anyone know where Sharpening stones are sold in.... forgot the name
> wood elf city, I found the forge but can't find ore or the stone to get
> started. Oh, found the molds off 2 vendors... still trying to get use to the
> city and not falling off the edge :)
>
> Tenin
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> To: <eq_blacksmiths@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 9:28 AM
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Evil Smiths?
>
> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> I don't know if this has been asked before, but where can I find smithing
> supplies for a Dark Elf? Do I have to go to Grobb or Oggok? or is there some
> place close? thanks.
>
